title: LabWeek Web3: Register to Attend, Host an Event and Join Us in Bangkok!
desc: Join us Nov. 7-13 in Bangkok for a decentralized conference that’s designed by builders, for builders with a focus on securing digital human rights and making the internet more equitable for all.

title: Meet Mosaia
desc: Mosaia's AI-driven OS helps web3 teams quickly find the right smart contract audit firms, saving weeks of effort. With seamless vendor matching and ongoing AI enhancements, Mosaia boosts web3 startup efficiency and security.

title: The Transformative Power of Neurotechnology
desc: Dive into neurotechnology's transformative potential and its pivotal role in advancing human capabilities, healthcare, and understanding the brain's complexities.

title: Meet Spice AI: Empowering Developers with AI and Data Infrastructure
desc: Spice AI stands at the forefront of web3 data access and utilization, offering a platform for the development of AI-driven applications

title: Announcing LabWeek Field Building at Edge Esmeralda in June 2024
desc: Introducing LabWeek Field Building at Edge Esmeralda

title: LabWeek Public Goods Charts a Brighter Future in Funding, Sustainability and Decentralized Science
desc: We recently announced that LabWeek was coming to the San Francisco Bay Area April 11-16, 2024 with a focus on public goods.

title: Meet Nova Energy: Building a Sustainable Future in Web3
desc: Nova Energy is on a mission to forge a future where every kilowatt of energy and every byte of data contributes to a more sustainable digital landscape.

title: Announcing LabWeek Public Goods in April 2024
desc: Our current economic systems are inadequate for solving the challenges we have today, including climate change and early scientific research.

title: PL Vision: Driving Breakthroughs in Computing to Push Humanity Forward
desc: In a century marked by unprecedented technological capabilities, we find ourselves at a crossroads. The outdated macro systems that once coordinated global efforts are struggling to adapt to the rapid evolution of our digital landscape.

title: Meet Canza Finance: Empowering Africa's Financial Future
desc: Canza Finance is a Web3 neobank focused on redefining cross-border payments and financial services for African businesses.

title: Protocol Labs Forms Strategic Alliance With Chainlink Labs to Support Promising Startups
desc: With a shared vision to empower the next generation of tech startups, Protocol Labs has formed a strategic alliance with Chainlink Labs, the primary contributing developer of the industry-standard decentralized computing platform Chainlink.

title: Meet Rollup ID: Revolutionizing Identity in the Digital World
desc: Rollup ID is focused on digital identity solutions and redefining how we think about user authentication and privacy.

title: Meet 3Box Labs: Building a Web of Trust with Data
desc: 3Box Labs is focused on building decentralized data infrastructure to advance the Web3 ecosystem.

title: Meet Zama: Pioneering the Future of Encrypted Data
desc: Zama is a cryptography company building open source homomorphic encryption tools for developers.

title: Advancing IPFS and libp2p Governance
desc: IPFS and libp2p are officially taking big steps forward in project maturity, with independent foundations and funding structures.

title: Breakthrough Scalability with InterPlanetary Consensus (IPC)
desc: IPC unlocks a new era of web3 scaling and flexibility for builders through recursively scalable subnets and sub-second transactions.

title: The State of Zero-Knowledge Proofs: From Research to Serious Business
desc: Exclusive research and expert commentary on zero-knowledge proofs (zk proofs) that allow the verification of sensitive info without revealing the info itself.

title: PL: Past, Present & Future
desc: Juan Benet shares his ambitious vision for how PL fosters major technological advancements through an innovation network for a comprehensive R&D pipeline.

title: Meet Gensyn: The Machine Learning Compute Network
desc: Gensyn is a machine learning compute network. It allows developers to train deep learning models over a network of connected devices, from data centers with excess capacity to personal laptops with latent GPUs.

title: Introducing Protocol Labs Venture Studio (PL VS)
desc: Protocol Labs is excited to announce Protocol Labs Venture Studio, an initiative dedicated to growing and enabling new startups building breakthrough technologies.

title: Meet Banyan: Reimagining Cloud Data Storage
desc: Banyan creates usable, secure, vertically-integrated, decentralized storage solutions for users with significant data storage needs. Banyan provides the benefits of Web3 encryption and decentralization to Web2-savvy consumers in a familiar user interface.

title: Protocol Labs Partners with Consensys to Empower Advanced Stage Web3 Startups
desc: Consensys Scale Program offers builders access to a complete Web3 product suite and support for their blockchain projects.

title: Meet Numbers Protocol: Building Authenticity in the Age of Generative AI
desc: Numbers Protocol is a decentralized photo network for creating community, value and trust in digital media. By instantly uploading digital images onto the blockchain via the company’s Capture app.

title: LabWeek23 Coming to Istanbul in November
desc: LabWeek23 is back! Last year, more than 1,500 builders gathered in Lisbon, Portugal, for the first-ever decentralized conference. Focused on shaping the future of the internet, LabWeek23 will bring the community together again November 13-17, 2023 in Istanbul, Turkey, alongside Devconnect.

title: Incentivizing Impact Beyond Carbon
desc: This summer, many regions around the world are experiencing record-breaking heat. The Kyoto Protocol, the international treaty adopted more than 25 years ago in 1997, was designed to prevent this by reducing greenhouse gas emissions via, among other things, initiatives that incentivize positive environmental impact, such as emissions trading.

title: Meet Cryptosat: Satellites for Cryptographic Protocols
desc: Cryptosat builds small, cost-efficient satellites that provide the cryptographic trust infrastructure for Web3 via perfect physical isolation in space.

title: Transcription: Building a decentralized content delivery system with Lassie
desc: Lassie, a new tool designed to find and retrieve data from both Filecoin and IPFS, started as a way to make Filecoin retrieval easy.

title: Announcing: Protocol Labs Partners With a16z Crypto Startup School
desc: Protocol Labs and a16z crypto have joined forces in a new program that provides tailored support for some of Web3’s most visionary founders participating in the 2023 Crypto Startup School (CSS), an accelerator program designed around the specific needs of Web3 startups.

title: Accelerate your Web3 journey: Protocol Labs Launchpad Summit on July 16-21
desc: Discover how you can participate in Protocol Lab’s most recent in-person learning opportunity: the Launchpad Summit on July 16-21 in Paris. We are thrilled to present this exciting new experience!

title: Jay Graber: Building Bluesky and a Decentralized Social Media Protocol
desc: In this technical talk, Jay Graber, CEO of Bluesky, discusses the architecture and design considerations for decentralized social media platforms.

title: Transcription: Filecoin Virtual Machine
desc: The Filecoin network is blazing a trail as the go-to platform for storing and accessing NFTs, public good datasets, web3, and Metaverse assets.It's not just a mere I/O layer of Web3 – it's a powerhouse with the potential to offer even more value by adding general smart contract programmability.

title: Discourse Graphs and the Future of Science
desc: Interview between Tom Kalil, Chief Innovation Officer of Schmidt Futures, Dr. Evan Miyazono, Research Team Lead at Protocol Labs, and Dr. Matt Akamatsu, Assistant Professor of Biology at the University of Washington.

title: Web3 Trends 2023: 3 Exciting Projects at Protocol Labs
desc: Protocol Labs has celebrated major milestones in line with its ambitions to build a decentralized web. In 2023, we want to keep the momentum going. Here are our three big bets for the year.
